repository.corpname: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation & Archives

origination.label: Creator
origination.corpname: Hotel Employees & Restaurant Employees International Union

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: The Hotel Employees and Restaurant Employees Union (HERE), was a labor union for workers in the hospitality industry and was formed in 1891. HERE merged with the Union of Neddletrades, Industrial and Textile Employees (UNITE), in 2004, to form UNITE HERE.

HERE and later UNITE HERE were affiliated with the AFL-CIO until September of 2005, when the General Executive Board of UNITE HERE voted to leave the AFL-CIO and join in with the Change to Win Coalition.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This is a collection of miscellaneous photographs covering events in the history of HERE. Some of the photographs are quite brittle and need to be handled carefully.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: HERE Historical Photographs #6199/013 P. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.
